BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Instrument methods on File that require write permission (#122109) (#122389) This commit adds instrumentation for File methods that require write permission. No server or plugins use these methods, so no policy changes were necessary. Note that since we are not planning to restrict temp file creation, the bootstrap self test on file writing was removed, which failed with these changes.
